age.Description: Age of the participant at time of testing

burn_type.Description: Burn type by cause of injury

burn_severity.Description: Burn injury severity on a scale of first to third degree

medication.Description: medication administered for pain to the patient during ICU stay

VAS_PRE_session1.Description: Visual Analogue scale VAS score for pain level pre-music therapy intervention (0-10, 0:no-pain, 10:max-pain). First session.

VAS_POST_session1.Description: Visual Analogue scale VAS score for pain level post-music therapy intervention (0-10, 0:no-pain, 10:max-pain). First session.

VAS_PRE_session2.Description: Visual Analogue scale VAS score for pain level pre-music therapy intervention (0-10, 0:no-pain, 10:max-pain). Second session.

VAS_POST_session2.Description: Visual Analogue scale VAS score for pain level post-music therapy intervention (0-10, 0:no-pain, 10:max-pain). Second session.

A-HADS_baseline.Description: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale HADS score for anxiety levels (0-21, 0:no-anxiety, 21:max-anxiety) at the moment of inform consent firmed before any music therapy intervention

D-HADS_baseline.Description: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale HADS score for depression levels (0-21, 0:no-depression, 21:max-depression) at the moment of inform consent firmed before any music therapy intervention

T-HADS_baseline.Description: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale HADS Total score (0-21, 0:no-Anxiety/depression, 21:max-Anxiety/depression) at the moment of inform consent firmed before any music therapy intervention

A-HADS_last.Description: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale HADS score for anxiety levels (0-21, 0:no-anxiety, 21:max-anxiety)  after the last music therapy intervention

D-HADS_last.Description: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale HADS score for depression levels (0-21, 0:no-depression, 21:max-depression)  after the last music therapy intervention

T-HADS_last.Description: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale HADS Total score (0-21, 0:no-Anxiety/depression, 21:max-Anxiety/depression) after the last music therapy intervention
